mapper.insert: INSERT INTO af_youdun_face( back_card , birthday , oid_partner , photo_living , result_auth , fail_reason , sign_field , age , gender , user_id , validity_period , photo_get , no_order , id_name , front_card , info_order , nation , sign , gmt_create , photo_grid , address , issuing_authority , be_idcard , no_product , id_no )VALUES( #{backCard}, #{birthday}, #{oidPartner}, #{photoLiving}, #{resultAuth}, #{failReason}, #{signField}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{userId}, #{validityPeriod}, #{photoGet}, #{noOrder}, #{idName}, #{frontCard}, #{infoOrder}, #{nation}, #{sign}, NOW(), #{photoGrid}, #{address}, #{issuingAuthority}, #{beIdcard}, #{noProduct}, #{idNo} )
